医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
预防早产的新希望：IL-6R阻断可降低新生儿死亡率白细胞介素 (IL)-6 和 IL-1α 在无菌羊膜内炎症 (SIAI) 中的作用，这是一种与早产 (PTB) 相关的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/New-hope-for-preventing-preterm-births-IL-6R-blockade-reduces-neonatal-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/New-hope-for-preventing-preterm-births-IL-6R-blockade-reduces-neonatal-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a10a065e-4541-4971-a5cc-f394e7889599 Thu, 09 Nov 2023 06:13:00 -0500 New hope for preventing preterm births: IL-6R blockade reduces neonatal mortality
新型玻璃粉有望止血和预防感染用于枪伤和其他身体创伤后止血的玻璃粉也能起到抗菌作用并帮助避免感染吗？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/New-glass-powder-shows-promise-for-stopping-bleeding-and-preventing-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/New-glass-powder-shows-promise-for-stopping-bleeding-and-preventing-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c306536b-e56a-43b3-b63d-1e25e3d4f393 Thu, 09 Nov 2023 05:55:20 -0500 New glass powder shows promise for stopping bleeding and preventing infections
研究表明较低的睾酮水平与关节炎风险增加有关美国成年人血清睾酮水平与关节炎之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Study-links-lower-testosterone-levels-with-increased-arthritis-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Study-links-lower-testosterone-levels-with-increased-arthritis-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ccd10298-845e-4413-bb93-953d5e688553 Thu, 09 Nov 2023 05:55:00 -0500 Study links lower testosterone levels with increased arthritis risk
一条胳膊和一条腿：“你的钱还是你的生命”：这位医生写了一本关于医疗债务的书2019 年，急诊医学医师兼历史学家卢克·梅萨克 (Luke Messac) 担任住院医师。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-e28098Your-Money-or-Your-Lifee28099-This-doctor-wrote-the-book-on-medical-债务.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-e28098Your-Money-or-Your-Lifee28099-This-doctor-wrote-the-book-on-medical-债务.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fbe7091-145d-4183-835a-ca8f7eda84ec Thu, 09 Nov 2023 05:46:23 -0500 An Arm and a Leg: ‘Your Money or Your Life’: This doctor wrote the book on medical debt
患有多动症的年轻黑人男性诊断不足、治疗不足，被抛在后面作为一个孩子，韦斯利·杰克逊·韦德本应该为成功做好准备。他的父亲是小说家和公司销售总监，母亲是特殊教育老师。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Underdiagnosed-and-undertreatment-young-Black-males-with-ADHD-get-left-behind.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Underdiagnosed-and-undertreatment-young-Black-males-with-ADHD-get-left-behind.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=debf1ec8-96d9-4cab-916b-37971d01fc60 Thu, 09 Nov 2023 05:40:15 -0500 Underdiagnosed and undertreated, young Black males with ADHD get left behind
如果婴儿能够及时接种，新的 RSV 疫苗可以帮助保护今年冬天的婴儿当艾米莉·本特 (Emily Bendt) 第一次听说疾病控制与预防中心批准了一种新的婴儿疫苗以保护他们免受呼吸道合胞病毒 (RSV) 感染时，她正处于妊娠晚期。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/A-new-RSV-shot-could-help-protect-babies-this-winter-e28094-if-they-can-get-it-in-时间.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/A-new-RSV-shot-could-help-protect-babies-this-winter-e28094-if-they-can-get-it-in- time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=154dc6d9-5992-4511-a9d0-0bc91459ed8c Thu, 09 Nov 2023 05:38:22 -0500 A new RSV shot could help protect babies this winter — if they can get it in time
揭开衰老的秘密：ENABL Age 使用尖端人工智能技术提供详细、个性化的衰老档案将机器学习与可解释的人工智能 (XAI) 相结合，通过个性化解释来预测生物年龄。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Unlocking-secrets-of-aging-ENABL-age-offers-detailed-individualized-aging-profiles-using-cutting-edge-AI-techniques.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Unlocking-secrets-of-aging-ENABL-age-offers-detailed-individualized-aging-profiles-using-cutting-edge-AI-techniques.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d235c959-e847-403a-bdb2-a9a82efe2a46 Thu, 09 Nov 2023 05:29:00 -0500 Unlocking secrets of aging: ENABL age offers detailed, individualized aging profiles using cutting-edge AI techniques
瑞典 25 年研究揭示道路交通污染与死亡风险增加之间的联系探索道路交通污染与死亡风险增加之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/25-year-Swedish-study-reveals-link- Between-road-traffic-pollution-and-increased-mortality-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/25-year-Swedish-study-reveals-link- Between-road-traffic-pollution-and-increased-mortality-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7870b4a8-14a7-4ca5-b970-e3796088c332 Thu, 09 Nov 2023 04:15:00 -0500 25-year Swedish study reveals link between road traffic pollution and increased mortality risk
使用 INTEGRA Biosciences 的新电子书实现无压力移液INTEGRA Biosciences 很高兴地宣布发布一本新电子书，提供完整的移液指南。液体处理方案构成了许多生命科学工作流程的支柱，掌握正确的移液操作对于获得可靠的实验结果起着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Achieve-stress-free-pipetting-with-INTEGRA-Biosciencese28099-new-eBook.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Achieve-stress-free-pipetting-with-INTEGRA-Biosciencese28099-new-eBook.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2bed3cbb-9104-4ea9-a88e-daba137c658a Thu, 09 Nov 2023 03:36:00 -0500 Achieve stress-free pipetting with INTEGRA Biosciences’ new eBook
基因熔炉：研究揭示了欧洲血统人群中的复杂混合物在《自然通讯》最近的一项研究中，研究人员发现欧洲人和欧洲美国人拥有显着的次大陆遗传混合，挑战了这些人群是同质的观念。这一发现表明需要重新评估遗传流行病学研究，这些研究可能忽略了混合对这些群体中疾病关联和性状遗传力的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Genetic-melting-pot-Study-unveils-complex-admixture-in-European-ancestry-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Genetic-melting-pot-Study-unveils-complex-admixture-in-European-ancestry-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efc91189-4d08-449e-bbbc-54dc50dbed9d Wed, 08 Nov 2023 23:31:00 -0500 Genetic melting pot: Study unveils complex admixture in European ancestry populations
